data.question: What is the empirical formula of PCM-102?
At what temperature were the gas adsorption-desorption isotherms for PCM-102 collected?
data.answer: 77 K for N2, H2, O2 and 196 K for CO2, CH4

data.question: What is the crystal system of Ag-PCM-102?
What method was used to calculate the binding energies for the various C2 hydrocarbons in PCM-102?
What is the ideal Ag:Co ratio for 100% Ag loading in Ag-PCM-102 according to ICP-OES data?
Why was the SQUEEZE utility in PLATON applied to metalated PCM-102 structures post-refinement?
data.answer: To remove residual peaks due to disordered solvent

data.question: What was the purpose of using the Bader analysis in the study?
data.answer: To determine the electronic charge on each atom

data.question: Is the crystal structure of Cu-PCM-102 orthorhombic?
Did the study find that the sorption capacities for the M-PCM-102 materials were similar to other benchmark MOFs for C2 hydrocarbon separation?
Was the PXRD pattern of Ag-PCM-102 made post-synthetically identical to that of Ag-PCM-102 synthesized peri-synthetically?
Did the study use the Perdew-Burke-Ernzerhof functional for electron exchange and correlation?
Was the crystal system of Au-PCM-102 reported as monoclinic?
Did the study report the use of a nitrogen gas Cryostream for freezing the crystals during SCXRD data collection?
Was the Ag loading in Ag-PCM-102 found to be over 100% according to ICP-OES data?
Did the study find that the sorption capacities for the M-PCM-102 materials were lower than expected for C2 hydrocarbon separation?
What was the crystal system of PCM-102?
What was the purpose of using the Bader charges in the study?
data.answer: To understand the experimental adsorption profiles of the C2 hydrocarbons in Ag-PCM-102

data.question: What was the final R index for AgCu-PCM-102 made by Ag exchange?
Was the PXRD pattern of PCM-102 treated with 0.55 eq. Cu(I) per P2 pocket identical to that of Cu-PCM-102?
What was the method used for gas sorption studies?
data.answer: Volumetric adsorption measurements using a glass vacuum manifold equipped with a diffusion pump
